Introduction

This is a database structure viewer, based on the XRecord ORM. It's a small WSGI web application, using Werkzeug as the web-toolkit, and Mako as the template engine.

The viewer is shipped with the XRecord package, and may be obtained as source code from Sourceforge, or the Python Package Index. You'll find more information on the project home page.
